people.name: Mehran Ebrahimi
people.title: Assistant Professor, Faculty of Science, UOIT
people.research: Mathematical imaging and inverse problems; developing and validating efficient numerical methodologies for solving real-world, ill-posed inverse problems in the field of medical imaging.
people.description:
Education

Postdoctoral Fellowship: Dept. of Medical Biophysics, University of Toronto, Imaging Research, Sunnybrook Health Sciences Centre(2008-2013)
PhD: Department of Applied Mathematics, University of Waterloo, Waterloo, Ontario, Canada (2003-2008)

Awards

Canadian Breast Cancer Foundation (CBCF) Postdoctoral Fellowship
NSERC Postdoctoral Fellowship (2009-2010)

people.name: Sancgeetha Kulaseharan
people.title: Graduate Student - MSc
people.research: Working on combined texture and morphometric analyses of MR imaging to identify focal cortical dysplasia in children with focal epilepsy.
people.description: Co-supervised with Dr. Elysa Widjaja, Hospital for Sick Children, Toronto. She is working on combined texture and morphometric analyses of MR imaging to identify focal cortical dysplasia in children with focal epilepsy. Sancgeetha is the runner-up of the 2017 Three Minute Thesis (3MT) competition at UOIT.

people.name: Cory Falconer
people.title: Graduate Student - MSc
people.research: Resolution enhancement and denoising techniques for medical imaging applications.
people.description: Co-supervised with Dr. Sean Bohn, Cory is investigating resolution enhancement and denoising techniques for medical imaging applications. He will start his internship at the Communications Security Establishment (CSE) Canada in Ottawa as of May 1t 2017 for 4 to 8 months.

people.name: Mia Carmela Mojica
people.title: Graduate Student - PhD
people.education: MSc graduate in Applied Mathematics from the Philippines
people.research: Cardiac diffusion imaging, cardiac atlas construction, image deblurring, and denoising.
people.description: Mia has won the prestigious Ontario Trillium Scholarship after Ô¨Ånishing her MSc in Applied Math in Philippines. She is working on a number of inverse problems for medical imaging applications. She has recently started collaborating with Dr. Mihaela Pop (Sunnybrook research institute) to create a pig cardiac atlas.

people.name: Kamyar Nazeri
people.title: Graduate Student - MSc
people.education: BSc in Electrical Engineering from Iran
people.research: Deep learning algorithms, in particular: convolutional neural networks (CNNs), in medical image analysis and processing.
people.description: BSc graduate in Electrical Engineering from Isfahan U. of Tech., Iran. He is currently working on machine learning algorithms for medical imaging applications.

people.name: Lorraine Ma
people.title: Graduate Student - MSc
people.research: Medical image registration schemes for Cardiac MRI.
people.description:
Lorraine is investigating image registration schemes for Cardiac MRI for which the data is provided by Prof. Graham Wright (Sunnybrook Research Institute). Lorraine won the people‚Äôs choice award at the 2016 Three Minute Thesis (3MT¬Æ).
She defended her thesis in August 2015 and joined the University of Auckland, New Zealand, as an exchange student in Fall 2016 on a Queen Elizabeth II Diamond Jubilee Scholarship.

people.name: Ghazaleh Ahmadian
people.title: Graduate Student - MSc
people.description: Co-supervised with Dr. Sean Bohun. Ghazal is investigating breast image registration schemes aimed at Computer aided surgery (CAS), for which the data is provided by Dr. Anne Martel (Sunnybrook Research Institute).

people.name: Eric NG
people.title: Graduate Student - MSc
people.description: Former NSERC USRA and thesis student, he has won Dean‚Äôs and entrance scholarships and has the highest GPA among all of my students.

people.name: Azad Aminpour
people.title: Graduate Student - PhD
people.education: MSc graduate in Computer Science from Iran
people.research: Computer Vision, Machine/Robotic Vision and, Medical Imaging.
people.description: Azad has expertise in the area of MachineLearning and ArtiÔ¨Åcial Intelligent. He has won the Graduate International Tuition Scholar-ship (GITS) oÔ¨Äered to at most one candidate per Faculty.

people.name: Queenie Leung
people.title: Undergraduate Thesis Student
people.education: BSc in Applied and Industrial Math
people.description: After completing her NSERC USRA, she completed her thesis on Image Segmentation using Graph cuts.

people.name: Xu Han
people.title: MITACS Globalink Research Intern
people.description: Visiting from Biomedical Engineering Program, Huazhong University of Science and Technology, Wuhan, China, Project: Registration of Breast MR Images.

people.name: Saurabh Agarwal
people.title: MITACS Globalink Research Intern
people.description: Visiting from School of Electronics Engineering, VIT, Chennai, India Project: Segmentation of Breast MR Images.
